title: 打开背包放置物品都会闪退
author: huaqiyue
txt_content:
23.05 08:49:08 [Disconnect] User Yooke has disconnected, reason: Internal Exception: java.io.IOException: 远程主机强迫关闭了一个现有的连接。
23.05 08:48:42 [Multicraft] §2Yooke§r ran command 每日信息
23.05 08:48:42 [Connect] User §2Yooke§r, IP  
23.05 08:48:40 [Server] INFO Builder: Yooke
23.05 08:48:40 [Server] INFO 当前有 1 个玩家在线,最大在线人数为 30 个玩家.
23.05 08:48:29 [Multicraft] Yooke ran command 每日信息
23.05 08:48:29 [Connect] User Yooke, IP。。。。。。。。这里是ip
23.05 08:48:29 [Server] INFO Server side modded connection established
23.05 08:48:28 [Server] INFO Attempting connection with missing mods [] at CLIENT
23.05 08:48:28 [Server] INFO Client attempting to join with 19 mods : AdvancedSolarPanel@1.7.10-3.5.1,BuildCraft|Factory@6.0.17,inventorytweaks@1.59-dev-156-af3bc68,Forge@10.13.2.1291,CustomOreGen@1.2.18,CodeChickenCore@1.0.4.29,BuildCraft|Energy@6.0.17,BuildCraft|Silicon@6.0.17,BuildCraft|Transport@6.0.17,GraviSuite@1.7.10-2.0.1,mcp@9.05,FML@7.10.85.1291,BuildCraft|Core@6.0.17,NotEnoughItems@1.0.3.74,TooManyItems@1.7.10[hukk汉化],IC2@2.2.624-experimental,DamageIndicatorsMod@3.2.3,BuildCraft|Builders@6.0.17,InputFix@1.7.x-v2
23.05 08:48:28 [Server] INFO Client protocol version 1


由于是新手腐竹 求会技术的师傅

replies.author: Hero_rix
replies.txt_content:
huaqiyue 发表于 2015-5-23 09:43
重装了3遍了 会不会是插件的错
应该是mod或者插件的问题，楼主检查下吧

replies.author: huaqiyue
replies.txt_content: 放置物品会崩服 打开背包就会直接闪退 {:10_503:}求解决

replies.author: huaqiyue
replies.txt_content:
Hero_rix 发表于 2015-5-23 08:57
重装服务端试试看吧
{:10_503:}重启无数回了

replies.author: Hero_rix
replies.txt_content:
huaqiyue 发表于 2015-5-23 09:39
重启无数回了
是重装服务端，不是重启服务器= =

replies.txt_content:

也有可能是mod出问题了，楼主检查下吧
